name: Pacific Gas & Electric Company PG&E
emergency_steps:
1. If you smell natural gas, see downed power lines, or suspect another emergency situation, leave the area immediately.  
2. Call 9-1-1 to report the emergency.  
3. Then, contact PG&E at 1-800-743-5000 to inform them of the situation.  
4. Do not touch or go near downed power lines as they are not insulated and can be deadly.  
5. Stay informed through PG&E's power outage information line at 1-800-743-5002 for updates and safety tips.

Non-Emergency Tips:  
- Use the PG&E "Report It" app to report non-emergency issues such as trees or vegetation near powerlines, problems with PG&E equipment, and other safety concerns pge.com.  
- Explore ways to reduce energy use and save on your bill by implementing energy-saving tips for your home pge.com.
